imgs.text: Conway One Design photo on sailboatdata.com

name: CONWAY ONE DESIGN
notes: The CONWAY ONE DESIGN  was built specifically to race in the waters of Conway Bay. (Wales, UK) The first boat  had a lifting keel or centreboard, but was changed to a fixed keel. 2 were built of moulded GRP in the late 1980's. Most of the original boats are still sailing (2010).
